com.helger.schematron.pure.errorhandler

Interface IPSErrorHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPSErrorHandler, CollectingPSErrorHandler, DoNothingPSErrorHandler, LoggingPSErrorHandler

    public interface IPSErrorHandler
    Base interface for a Pure Schematron error handler.
    Author:
    Philip Helger

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void error(IPSElement aSourceElement, String sMessage)
      Emit an error.

      void warn(com.helger.commons.io.resource.IReadableResource aRes, IPSElement aSourceElement, String sMessage)
      Emit a warning

    • Method Detail

      • warn

        void warn(@Nullable
        com.helger.commons.io.resource.IReadableResource aRes,
        @Nullable
        IPSElement aSourceElement,
        @Nonnull
        String sMessage)
        Emit a warning
        Parameters:
        aRes - The resource in which the error occurred. May be null.
        aSourceElement - The source element where the warning is encountered. Maybe null for XPath errors.
        sMessage - The main warning message. Never null.

      • error

        void error(@Nullable
         IPSElement aSourceElement,
         @Nonnull
         String sMessage)
        Emit an error. Shortcut for error(IReadableResource, IPSElement, String, Throwable) with null IReadableResource and null Throwable.
        Parameters:
        aSourceElement - The source element where the warning is encountered. Maybe null for XPath errors.
        sMessage - The main warning message. Never null.

      • error

        void error(@Nullable
         com.helger.commons.io.resource.IReadableResource aRes,
         @Nullable
         IPSElement aSourceElement,
         @Nonnull
         String sMessage,
         @Nullable
         Throwable t)
        Emit an error
        Parameters:
        aRes - The resource in which the error occurred. May be null.
        aSourceElement - The source element where the warning is encountered. Maybe null for XPath errors.
        sMessage - The main warning message. Never null.
        t - An optional exception that is the source of the error. May be null.
